search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Grow (grow.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I couldn't locate the official pricing page URL for Grow directly. Please check their website at [Grow.com](https://www.grow.com) for further details or reach out to them directly. Let me know if you want assistance with anything else!

![Image 19: Sports Illustrated Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/60134cc6c77bd834578b7898_Sports.svg)

![Image 20: TSYS logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/60134cd127db74dbc9b8937c_TSYS.svg)

Turn speed and agility into your competitive edge
-------------------------------------------------

![Image 21: data-driven decisions animated gif](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/60356189f9d54e395dea9035_hero.gif)

### Democratization

Unlock the power of data across all levels of your organization with Grow’s no-code platform. Embrace a quicker decision-making process and foster a data-driven culture, accessible to everyone.

### Empowerment

Transform your team into data rockstars. With Grow, the need for specialized data teams becomes a thing of the past. Experience increased efficiency and expertise, as your team excels in driving data-driven results.

### Productivity

Take your team’s performance to the next level. Grow streamlines your data processes, allowing your team to focus on what really matters – strategic tasks and innovation, not technical complexities.

Experience Unparalleled Simplicity and Versatility
--------------------------------------------------

Grow is committed to delivering products that are not only intuitively designed but are also simple and user-friendly. Our focus on ease of use ensures quick adoption and maximizes utility, setting us apart in the Business Intelligence world and ensuring your team can fully leverage our tools from day one.

![Image 22: entrata Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff58cecfc63a0fce4ad456d_entrata.svg)

![Image 23: real thread logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/60134bbf7ad2e148ed7a0c3b_Real%20Thread.svg)

![Image 24: Beam Healthcare Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5911216804b245b793e3e_beam.svg)

![Image 25: Gymshark Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/60134b9529b979b064df25bd_Gymshark_logo.svg)

[![Image 26: Play Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5a96b7dd75fc68d66d44a_ico-play.svg)](https://www.grow.com/#)

### Everton Football Club

Everton empowers their entire team with the data while still maintaining control.

![Image 27: Everton Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5a8836cc8be36589e7604_everton-logo.svg)

[![Image 28: Play Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5a96b7dd75fc68d66d44a_ico-play.svg)](https://www.grow.com/#)

### Indus Holdings

Indus Holdings surfaces game-changing insights on the fly to key executives.

![Image 29: Indus Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5a9f9348cca1ab1d342c2_indus-logo.svg)

[![Image 30: Play Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5a96b7dd75fc68d66d44a_ico-play.svg)](https://www.grow.com/#)

### What Customers are Saying

From large manufacturers to fast-growing eCommerce, to mission-driven non-profits, Grow is transformational.

![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65b14dc038390691f8bc6522_testimonial-rating-teal.svg)

### Best value

“Grow is the best value in analytics available. Grow enables our decision makers to be predictive for both internal and external forces that affect thee bottom line.”

![Image 32: Bubba Testimonial](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5b3281889e501237d0d5e_bubba.png)

COO (Healthcare Tech)  
400 employees

![Image 33: Five Star Rating](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65b14dc038390691f8bc6522_testimonial-rating-teal.svg)

### Complete visibility

“Amazing. Now we have a central location of all our data. It has allowed us to look at our whole business in real-time.”  
‍

![Image 34: Kristopher Testimonial](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5b3f3af6f524bc3c2cebf_kristopher.png)

#### Kristopher K.

VP Finance (eCommerce)  
80 employees

![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65b14dc038390691f8bc6522_testimonial-rating-teal.svg)

### No-code, self serve

“I selected Grow because of its ease of use. We needed a platform that we could connect, setup, and build insights without SQL or the use of our software engineers.”

![Image 36: Bret Testimonial](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff5b420ab9d0f1934c596c8_bret.png)

#### Bret L.

CEO (Tech)  
75 employees

[![Image 45: Capterra ShortList 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65e0f161b9618a5bf6b54db3_ca-shortlist-2024.png)](https://www.capterra.com/business-intelligence-software/shortlist/)

[![Image 46: Leader Spring 2024](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/677ee29b1d2b3ca282a3288a_BusinessIntelligence_Leader_Leader.png)](https://www.g2.com/products/grow-com/reviews#details)

[![Image 47: GetApp Category Leaders 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/641cc3a9eb881001690fc092_badge-getapp-category-leaders-2023.png)](https://www.getapp.com/business-intelligence-analytics-software/a/grow/)

[![Image 48: Software Advice Front Runners 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65e0f161f86da5c7a8f63fa5_sa-frontrunners-2024.png)](https://www.softwareadvice.com/bi/grow-profile/)

Discover What Sets Grow Apart
-----------------------------

![Image 49: 150+ Integrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65b157ccc3fd690beeea17b4_icon-integrations-white.svg)

75+ Integrations
----------------

Grow seamlessly integrates with Google BigQuery, PostgreSQL, MySQL, HubSpot, Salesforce, Quickbooks, Google Analytics, and 75+ data sources!

![Image 50: Unlimited Users](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65b157fa7de4db7cc4e6bd8f_icon-unlimited-users-white.svg)

Unlimited Users
---------------

Say goodbye to per-seat charges. With Grow, unlimited users mean unlimited growth potential. Set the right permissions and create a unified data environment for your entire team.

![Image 51: One Platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65b15805d9c63e9fbcd14014_icon-one-platform-white.svg)

One Platform
------------

Grow isn’t just a tool; it’s a comprehensive solution. Combining ETL, data warehousing, visualization, and alerts, Grow is your all-in-one platform for business intelligence.

![Image 52: No Code](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/65b158104e6fb6c92b77cb1e_icon-no-code-white.svg)

No-code, Full-stack BI
----------------------

Experience the power and scalability necessary for analysts, coupled with the simplicity needed for business users to self-serve. Grow bridges the gap between complex data analysis and everyday business needs.

### Connect all your data

Connect, store, and blend data from hundreds of data sources and SQL databases. Whether its millions or billions of rows of data, Grow has you covered.

[Learn More](https://www.grow.com/product/features#ETLDataPrep)

![Image 53: Connect Data Sources](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/602ad0abcb15dde84530090b_connect.gif)

### Build a single source of truth

With inline ETL transforms and point and click tools you no longer need complex SQL queries to clean and prep your data.

[Learn More](https://www.grow.com/product/features#DataStorage)

![Image 54: Single Source of Truth](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/602ad29ba7d95a5fc47e73f6_prerp.gif)

### Automate your reporting

Automate data pipelines and control your data refresh schedules to keep data dashboards always up to date.

![Image 55: Automate Your Reporting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ff6fbcc0cb2612d9203a061_automate-pic.png)

### Explore your data

Empower everyone to answer their own questions and surface insights on their own.

[Learn More](https://www.grow.com/product/features#Visualize)

![Image 56: Explore Your Data](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/5ffd9688a114a081e28a7713_explore-video.gif)

### Beautiful interactive visualizations

With Grow's business dashboard tool, build powerful data visualizations and KPI metrics.

[Learn More](https://www.grow.com/product/features#Visualize)

### Share and collaborate

Make better decisions by giving everyone access to your database dashboards. Collaborate around the data and insights you create.

[Learn More](https://www.grow.com/product/features#Share)

![Image 57: Share and Collaborate](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/602ad68522fbc78a94eb4d5b_collab.gif)

A single source of truth
------------------------

Get everyone on the same page looking at the right data

![Image 58: Single Source of Truth Graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/603558ab4e43bd24d6b7cf97_With%20Grow.png)

![Image 59: Multiple Sources of Truth Graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bc779c7cb6515eacd17ad0f/603558d52d2616396d7e70b0_Without%20Grow.png)

Request a Free Trial
--------------------

JOIN THE THOUSANDS OF BUSINESS LEADERS WINNING WITH GROW

Unlock the answers hiding in your data.

Hi, How can I help? Let's chat.

Business intelligence software that frees the insights you desperately need to fuel growth and transform your business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The pricing details are not explicitly listed on the website, but a free trial is available.
